name: zebNet Backup File Extended
summary: Learn about .ZBFX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The ZBFX file is used by all of the zebNet backup programs to store backup data. The zebNet backup programs for web browsers include Backup for Chrome, Backup for Firefox, Backup for Internet Explorer (discontinued), Backup for Opera Browser, and Backup for SeaMonkey.

The zebNet backup programs for email clients include Backup for Outlook, Backup for Thunderbird, Backup for eM Client, Backup for Opera Mail, Backup for SeaMonkey, Backup for Postbox, Backup for Live Mail (discontinued), and Backup for IncrediMail.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
